build_params.description: Parameters describing the build context to pass onto Bitrise. All keys are optional but specific workflows may depend on particular keys being set.

branch.description: The branch running the build. For pull requests, this should be the head branch.

branch_dest.description: The destination branch where the branch running the build will merge into. Only valid for pull requests.

branch_dest_repo_owner.description: The repository owning the destination branch. Only valid for pull requests.

commit_hash.description: The hash of the commit running the build.

commit_message.description: The commit message of the commit running the build.

environments.description: Environment variables to pass into the build.

pull_request_author.description: The author of the pull request running the build.

pull_request_id.description: The id of the pull request running the build.

skip_git_status_report.description: Whether Bitrise should send a status report to Github (default False).

tag.description: The tag of the commit running the build.
